description: Configuration file for Vitest testing framework using Vite. It imports default configurations and merges custom test settings like environment, exclusions, and root directory.

methods.name: mergeConfig
methods.description: Merges two Vitest configuration objects, combining default and custom settings.

methods.name: defineConfig
methods.description: Defines and validates a Vitest configuration object.

methods.name: configDefaults
methods.description: Provides default configuration values for Vitest.

methods.name: fileURLToPath
methods.description: Converts a URL object to a file system path.
